content: --- *part of the knit you advent calendar 2014 published as surprise for day 5 * --- this easy-peasy beanie will keep you and your family warm this winter perfect for gift knitting also it s both quick and easy and a great way to use some of the remaining small yarn remains you happen to have around add a pompom in highlight color to make things even more fun ***finished brim circumference *** 18 20 22 / 46 50 54 cm
